title: Behind Bengal BJP’s rout in civic polls: Inexperienced leadership, lack of a regional face, factionalism - The Indian Express
content: Behind Bengal BJP’s rout in civic polls: Inexperienced leadership, lack of a regional face, factionalism  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: In the recent civic elections -- the first big polls in the state since last year's Assembly election, when the BJP was completely outplayed by the ruling Trinamool Congress -- the party failed to win any of the 108 municipalities in the state.
